channel.title: Ponmaalai Music Kahoot – Demographic Insights
channel.description: Five bite-sized demographic insights from Ponmaalai Music Kahoot.

item.title: Generation Showdown: Generation Z lead on total points
item.description:
Generation Z: ████████████████████ (999345) Millennial: ████████████████ (798443)
Total points: 999345 | Δ vs #2: 200902
FUN FACT: Generation Z—often called “Zoomers”—is typically defined as people born 1997–2012 and is the first social generation to grow up with Web 2.0 and digital tech. [cite]

item.title: City Powerhouse: Tukwila racks up the most points
item.description:
Tukwila: ████████████████████ (144549) Newcastle: ███████████████████ (134147)
Total points: 144549 | Δ vs #2: 10402 | Avg reaction: 4.63s
FUN FACT: Tukwila is home to Westfield Southcenter, the largest shopping mall in Washington state. [cite]

item.title: Accuracy Ace: Gulbarga tops correctness rate
item.description:
Gulbarga: ████████████████████ (80.2%) Delhi: ███████████████████ (76.2%)
Total points: 61965 | Δ accuracy vs #2: 4.0pp
FUN FACT: Gulbarga (Kalaburagi) was the first capital of the Bahmani Sultanate in the 14th century. [cite]

item.title: Round-wise Dominance: Which generation owned each round
item.description:
Round 1 • Generation Z: 385708 (Δ 71563) Round 2 • Generation Z: 381113 (Δ 76487) Round 3 • Generation Z: 232524 (Δ 52852)
Grand total points across all rounds: 2419480
FUN FACT: The name “Generation Z” continues the sequence after Generation Y (Millennials). [cite]

item.title: Momentum & Projection: Generation Z surges in share
item.description:
Round1 → Round3: 41.1% → 42.2% Next round (proj): 43.3%
Δ share: 1.1pp
FUN FACT: Most members of Gen Z are children of Generation X. [cite]
